name: Interface Planet
tag_list: citrix, web, interface, custom, netscaler, access, gateway, vmware, view, microsoft, outlook, app, 2010, 2013, rdweb, 2012-
overview:
InterfacePlanet is a company which make interfaces since years. With its experienced designers and .Net developers, InterfacePlanet can design and customize the look and feel of many web applications to match with your corporate identity. We customize interface’s of different web-apps which includes products from Citrix, 2X, Microsoft and VMware.

InterfacePlanet is one of the pioneers in Interface Customization starting in 2006, InterfacePlanet’s proven history in Citrix Web Interface, Citrix NetScaler Access Gateway , Citrix Receiver for Web for CloudGateway , VMware View Portal, Microsoft Outlook Web App , Microsoft Outlook Web Access , Microsoft Threat Management Gateway 2010 and Microsoft Remote Desktop Web Access With more than 500+ customers and many users worldwide, InterfacePlanet has increased the performance of the world’s largest organizations.

We provide on demand computing environment, flexibility and freedom for people, and security and control for IT form the basis for business innovation and growth.
